Name: Fragment of a panel belonging to Hor-nakht
Description: Right lower corner of a panel, presumably rectangular. It depicts an open door with the wings opened outwards in raised relief. The door opening between the doorposts is deeper and not smoothed. Very probably this stela represents an open shrine. On the doorwing is a vertical line of carved inscription. In the threshold where the doorpost was fixed are two deep boreholes next to each other. Outside the doorwing are many traces of red paint on the background.
